executive_summary: The audit of the system agents reveals a balanced distribution of activities among the agents, with all compliance standards being met. Performance metrics are within acceptable ranges, though there is room for improvement in API latency. The system has effectively logged events and generated reports, with a moderate number of anomalies detected.

performance_analysis.cpu_usage: The CPU usage is at 35.86%, indicating efficient processing with no immediate concerns.
performance_analysis.memory_usage: Memory usage is at 55.86%, which is within normal operational limits.
performance_analysis.api_latency: API latency is at 75.86ms, which is higher than optimal and may require optimization.
performance_analysis.throughput: Throughput is at 125.86 transactions per second, indicating robust processing capability.

agent_activity.summary: Each agent has performed 21 activities, showing a balanced workload distribution across all agents.

key_findings: All compliance standards (security, performance, reliability) are met.
API latency is higher than optimal, which could affect user experience.
A total of 23 anomalies were detected, indicating potential areas for further investigation.
The system has generated 4 reports and logged 105 events, demonstrating active monitoring and reporting.
recommendations: Investigate and optimize API latency to improve user experience.
Conduct a detailed analysis of the detected anomalies to identify and mitigate potential issues.
Continue monitoring compliance standards to ensure ongoing adherence.
Consider increasing the frequency of report generation to enhance oversight.
